name: CigiCigi Post Guest
author: CigiCigi Online iLk3r

sections.description: Guest Post easyl post new for the guest. This posts do not public. Only admin public posts. This plugin include standart text editor and BBCode editor, also include simple captcha and reCAPTCHA. Guests only one upload image or do not upload image option.
sections.installation:
1. Upload post-guest-cigicigi folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in your WordPress admin panel.
  3. Create a page or a post and insert shortcode [post_guest_cigicigi] to the text.
sections.changelog:
1.0.5

  • Sometimes waiting post list not to displaying posts. Fixed this bug.
  • During the image upload something wrong, upload continue. Fixed this bug.
  • Adding image width to image upload properties.
  • Javascript and css files compressed.
  • Fixed uninstall function.
  • Adding List tag for BBCode Editor

1.0.4

  • New feature upload image.
  • New feature flood protection.
  • Sometimes waiting posts listed on cache. New posts do not show. Fixed this.
  • CigiCigi Captcha error on some wordpress themes. Fixed this problem.
  • Fixed CigiCigi Captcha background image bug.
  • Post author name is changeable. (Default name is “Guest”)

1.0.3

  • Fixed XSS VULNERABILITY! When write on the form, run script wordpress admin page.
  • Post title and posts support HTML smile [ :), :++, =), :*, <3 ]
  • CigiCigi Captcha background is changeable option.
  • When wrong on the form, load new blank form. Fixed this problem.
  • Fixed CigiCigi Capthcha bug.

1.0.2

Fixed install database bug.
